title: email
body: Can someone please help me find a real working email to contact riot via email

replies.body: You can reach out to support through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or email us directly via support@riotgames.com.  If you're having an account recovery issue, you can fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) for our account team to review.  Let me know if I can help!
